title: Kim Kardashian shows off her GREEN pumpkins outside her $60M mansion
text:
Her sister Khloe Kardashian said in her True Hollywood Story special, 'I don't know how many hours are there in Kim's day but they are definitely more than mine because the things that Kim gets done, it blows my mind.'

And Kim Kardashian proved between being a mom-of-four, wife, CEO of various companies and law student, she still managed to get her home ready for the holidays.

The 38-year-old beauty took to social media on Monday to showcase the pumpkins she had placed in her $60 million Hidden Hills mansion for Halloween.

Style: Kim Kardashian showcased her lavish Halloween decor on Tuesday which saw her decorations perfectly match the interior of her $60 million home

Matching the bone colored interior of her million dollar home, Kim added a variety of different sized pumpkins of the same color to next to her stairwell.

There were more pumpkins outside of her home as well.

Rather than the traditional orange shade, she opted for green and teal props to match her outdoor landscape.

Matching: Rather than the traditional orange shade, she opted for green and teal props to match her outdoor landscape

Special moments: Kim also shared a sweet photo of her daughter Chicago, one, from her baptism in Armenia the other week

Kim also shared a sweet photo of her daughter Chicago, one, from her baptism in Armenia the other week. 'Chicago in Armenia,' she captioned the sweet shot.

Kim opted for a form-fitting bodycon dress with her head covered. She as she held her youngest daughter who was dressed in a sweet white dress.

Her eldest son, Saint, three, was also seen in the shot.

Youngest and oldest: It comes after Kim posted a photo of Psalm, five months, ahead of his baptism on Monday

Already done: Four years prior, Kim and husband Kanye took daughter North to Jerusalem to have her baptized with sister Khloe Kardashian there to be her godmother

3/4: Kim baptized Saint, three, Chicago, one, and Psalm, five-months

It comes after Kim posted a photo of Psalm, five months, ahead of his baptism on Monday.

On Friday, Kim revealed she was baptized along with her kids: 'Thank you Armenia for such a memorable trip,' she began.

'So blessed to have been baptized along with my babies at Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin, Armenia's main cathedral which is sometimes referred to as the Vatican of the Armenian Apostolic Church. This church was built in 303 AD,' adding the photo credit to Jackie Nickerson.

Four years prior, Kim and husband Kanye took daughter North to Jerusalem to have her baptized with sister Khloe Kardashian there to be her godmother.
description: Kim Kardashian showcased her lavish Halloween decor on Tuesday which saw her decorations perfectly match the interior of her $60 million home.
